All Classes

Class Description
AI
The interface AI.
AttributePanel
Panel used to attribute stats to each soldier.
BasePanel
Basic panel with the possibility to set a background.
ColorPalette
Colors defined in the specifications.
DefensiveAI
The type Defensive AI.
Dialog
Used to display information to the players while interrupting the game.
DragAndDrop
This class contains everything to create drag and drop functionalities and assign them to components.
EliteSoldier
The type Elite soldier.
Event
The type Action.
EventPanel
Panel used as main panel to display actions.
Field
This class represent one of the possibles battle zone.
FieldAttributionPanel
Panel used to attribute the soldiers to a field.
FieldColumn
Represent a column to assign soldiers to a field.
FieldPanel
Panel used to display one specific battlefield.
FieldProperties
This enumeration contains properties linked to a field and makes it easier to identify them.
GameController
The controller supervising access to model and the fighting step.
GeometryUtils
This class contains some useful methods to deal with geometry.
GlobalFieldPanel
Panel used to display the overhaul battlefield.
GraphicField
The type Graphic field.
GraphicSoldier
The type Graphic soldier.
Hit
This record is used to transmit an attack to a target soldier.
It contains the damages that would be caused upon receiving the attack and the chance of it hitting as a multiplier (ex: 1.1).
MainView
Main View containing all panels.
OffensiveAI
The type Offensive AI.
PanelIdentifier
Enumeration used to facilitate the manipulation of panels.
Player
The model used to store data related to a player.
PlayerIndicator
The type Player indicator.
PlayerInfoPanel
Panel used to get players' information.
RandomAI
The type Random AI.
Resource
This enumeration loads all the images needed for the game.
Soldier
This class represent a soldier.
StartingPanel
Panel used as the very start to greet players.
WarMaster
The type War master.
